text: jo log byaaj khaate hain, aise uthenge jaise vah uthata hai, jise shaitaan ne chhookar unamatt kar diya ho. unakee ye dasha is kaaran hogee ki unhonne kaha ki vyaapaar bhee to byaaj hee jaisa hai, jabaki allaah ne vyaapaar ko halaal (vaidh) , tatha byaaj ko haraam (avaidh) kar[1] diya hai. ab jisake paas usake paalanahaar kee or se nirdesh aa gaya aur is kaaran usase ruk gaya, to jo kuchh pahale liya, vah usee ka ho gaya tatha usaka maamala allaah ke havaale hai aur jo (log) phir vahee karen, to vahee naarakee hain, jo usamen sadaavaasee honge
